items.heading: My Accordion Item
items.content: Developers, system engineers, architects and security professionals who work with cloud infrastructure and cloud-native architecture should attend HashiDays to discover the latest technical insights and deep-dives, learn what’s new with HashiCorp open-source tools & enterprise products, receive product training, and connect with other HashiCorp community members who build and use HashiCorp tools every day.
